name: Space Garden (Katamary)
description:
Space Garden is a little space adventure. Player help the Astronaut Kitten to grow and protect a tree under the surface of a small asteroid. Insidious bionic spiders attack! Let's watering the plant and driving off aliens! Kitten needs your help, because he has paws :).

v. 06:

  • Fixed some visual bugs;
  • Added a text box about game controls.
